page.title: 17Centenary Year
page.content: The beginning of the Centenary Year brought a succession of visitors who recalled and shared with the children their personal memories of the school.These guests were able to span over eighty years in the life of Regent Street School.The children were inspired by the various speakers and began various studies about how we used to live.The Centenary Day celebration held on Monday April 20th 1985 was the highlight of the year when over 500 people visited the school .This was recorded by Yorkshire Television Company for Calender Tuesday.Two concerts were held on that day for parents,governors,ex-pupils, ex-staff and officials of the authority where the children's concert included readings and songs after which refeshments,Victorian style, were served by the children.
